headline: Is Becton, Dickinson and Company (BDX) the Best Dividend Monarch to Invest in Now?
summary: We recently published a list of the 10 Best Dividend Monarchs to Invest in Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Becton, Dickinson and Company (NYSE:BDX) stands against other best dividend monarchs. Dividend-focused investors are generally well-acquainted with terms like Dividend Aristocrats and Dividend Kings, but many may not […]
